text:
Hi folks,

Totally new to HubSpot. I'm getting up to speed thanks to the academy training courses.
Have a great rest of the day !

Hi folks, I'm new here as well. The Academy was really good, but it's a petty it's not promoted enough. Would have been great if I'd have known about it the first time I've jumped into HubSpot, instead of digging into documentation trying to make things work.
Have a great week!
Hey Serban, this is great feedback! We are working toward inserting more of our academy content throughout our docs to surface the content more. :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi Folks
Need some expert advise
I have my own Website developed on Magento and it has several links for users to download documents.
How do i track who has downloaded what document link using HubSpot

Today I have Google Tag Manager to measure the number of clicks on those links, but I'm not able to associate that with a Contact User
